extendedInfo.description: "The Gospel Writer" is written to help people understand the Bible and help them in the pursuit of Jesus Christ.I write one or two messages each week on various subjects.  Some messages are on what is happening in the world and the church.  Some messages are political or social commentary.  Some messages are just plain preaching or teaching.  The goal of each message is to present a biblical Christian world view in hope that those who read will hear more than my words, but come to a greater understanding of Godâs Word.
